recently_narrative:
1. The article titles suggest that Zendesk is undergoing a significant strategic shift towards AI-powered contact center solutions, as evidenced by the announcements of AI-driven features like intelligent triage for voice calls and the integration of GPT-5, while also facing operational challenges such as service incidents and the deprecation of legacy products.

2. This means that Zendesk administrators will need to carefully manage the transition to these new AI-powered capabilities, ensuring a stable and reliable implementation that addresses both the technical and organizational changes required, while also being prepared to adapt to the evolving Zendesk ecosystem and potential disruptions from external factors.

release_notes.summary:
1. Support added incremental export APIs for custom objects to enable customers to build reports on their custom object data in external reporting tools.

2. AI Agents Advanced released the unified request view and enabled agents to rate their own tickets where they are requestors, but fixed an issue where agents could no longer change a CSAT score for tickets they are not requestors of if they discover a link.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-09-19
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Support
AI Agents Advanced
Products with no updates this week
